title: Barliman Butterbur, Prancing Pony Proprietor (1U70)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Ally • Home 1 • Man
Strength:	1
Vitality:	2
Site:	1
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert Barliman Butterbur to take a [Gandalf] event into hand from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'You don't know much even about them, if you think old Barliman is stupid,' said Gandalf. 'He is wise enough on his own ground.'”
Rarity:	U
